actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill concerning legal counsel of recipients of loans under programs administered by the Department of Agriculture.

summary.text: Stipulates that recipients of loans which relate to real property under programs administered by the Department of Agriculutre may engage any individual admitted to the practice of law in the State in which such real property is located as their legal counsel for such loan with the Secretary of Agriculture.

titles.title: A bill concerning legal counsel of recipients of loans under programs administered by the Department of Agriculture.
